summary:
I am a polymath and creative strategist, with an impact-driven attitude and a humanistic background.
People tell I am passionate and authentic.
Multicultural, diversified and trans-disciplinary teams make me feel most comfortable.
I pursue beauty, fun and co-creation in every project: I consider these the most precious values humans can be offered.

My super power? Bringing people together.

projects:
[{'title': 'Envisioning MEET - International Centre for Digital Culture', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': '3 days to envision the structure and the activity of MEET, the new international centre for digital culture in Milan. The centre has been conceived to foster creativity and innovation in Italy and to promote digital initiatives, locally and internationally. MEET has started in 2019, it is a project by Meet the Media Guru in partnership with Fondazione Cariplo and the Institute without Boundaries of Toronto.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Gianmarco', 'last_name': 'Luggeri', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Creative Strategist | Universe-Centered Designer | Humanist'}]}, {'title': 'A legacy for Expo Area: a Global Village', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': "The 'Expo as a Global Village - Future Ways of Living' International Summer School was organised by the Institute without Boundaries and Meet the Media Guru to bring thought leaders, students, and professionals together to envision the future of the Milan Expo Area.
The result of 2 weeks of intensive work was a three-month exhibition that was included in the program of the XXI International Triennale Exposition.
My teammates and I envisioned The Village of Health and Wellness, a residential park populated by people of every age, where the self monitoring of health condition is a spread and daily habit, where the healthcare system is made efficient by a hyper-connected infrastructure and a secure database of shared information.
The implications of such a system have been well analysed in the linked article, right after the Covid19 breakout", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Gianmarco', 'last_name': 'Luggeri', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Creative Strategist | Universe-Centered Designer | Humanist'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sara', 'last_name': 'Rizza', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior Service Designer presso MAIZE | H-FARM Innovation'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Daniel', 'last_name': 'Garnier', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Digital Delivery + BIM Lead at BNKC Architects Inc.'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Guy', 'last_name': 'Matorin', 'name': None, 'headline': 'CXO at uCarenet Technologies, Head of design and research practice at Design Clinic.'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Chiara', 'last_name': 'Scagliotti', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Interior Designer & Sales Manager presso Casa Palladio Ltd'}]}, {'title': 'Future ways of living - MtMG Special Edition', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': "The special edition of Meet The Media Guru was organized with the Institute without Boundaries of Toronto in Milan,with the aim to open a debate about the society of the next 10 years. 17 thought leaders were invited for two days of conferences (Paola Antonelli, Donald Norman, Carlo Ratti and Lawrence Lessig among them).
In parallel a 'charrette' was started: 60 selected professionals, researchers and students from Italy and all over the world worked for two weeks to develope innovative ideas and prototypes for the future.
My teammates and I designed a network of companies and professionals, supported by an efficient digital system that helps them to direct knowledge and competences where they are needed at most, inside and outside a single business.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Gianmarco', 'last_name': 'Luggeri', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Creative Strategist | Universe-Centered Designer | Humanist'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anabela', 'last_name': 'Ferreira MBA', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Strategic Marketing & Circular Economy Consultant at Altran'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anastasiia', 'last_name': 'Kuleshova', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior Service Designer at Deloitte Digital'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Maria', 'last_name': 'Gotti', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Commercial Communications Manager'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Tha√≠s', 'last_name': 'Serafini', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior Service Designer'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Valentina', 'last_name': 'Altamura', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Network Engineering Professional presso Fastweb'}]}, {'title': 'Smart Materials & Design - SAES Getters', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'One-week workshop with SAES Getters, European leader in the field of smart materials and shape-memory alloys', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Gianmarco', 'last_name': 'Luggeri', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Creative Strategist | Universe-Centered Designer | Humanist'}]}, {'title': 'The office of tomorrow - HannoLab 2014', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'Pitch contest organized by the Hochschule Hannover. Two intense days to design a vision of the way people will work in the future.
The groups of work consisted of students from all over the world and professionals from important partner companies.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Gianmarco', 'last_name': 'Luggeri', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Creative Strategist | Universe-Centered Designer | Humanist'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ieva', 'last_name': 'Pastare', 'name': None, 'headline': 'CEO at Ltd. - A mobile app", 'title': 'Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}, {'location': 'Milano, Italia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': "Fondazione Cologni dei Mestieri d'Arte", 'description': 'Well-made.it was born in 2016 as a platform to discover the best local artisans and review their work, today it is the main Italian community of artistic crafts lovers, including: +20.000 registered users, +600 artisans, 15 partners, 30 ambassadors and 150 schools.

As PM of Wellmade, I started up the project and was responsible for:
- the relationship with the artisans, experts and partners;
- the artistic direction;
- the creation of contents;
- the management of social media;
- the coordination of the IT/technical team;
- the web analytics;
- the budget estimate and the costs report;
- the ideation and the carrying out of new initiatives (online or offline) to grow the community', 'title': 'Product Owner', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'TAOS - The Art Of Science', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'TAOS - The Art Of Science', 'description': 'Educational toys applying expired patents by NASA.', 'title': 'Graphic Designer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Alkimia snc', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Cabiate (CO)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Alkimia snc', 'description': '3 months in a modeling and prototyping studio near Milan.
